activities:
Red Beacon Inc. receives requests for local services from EU citizens and organizations acting on behalf of EU citizens.  We notify by email, SMS, fax, or telephone service professionals in the US or EU who are capable of fulfilling the consumer’s service request.  

To accomplish this operation, Red Beacon Inc. requests information from consumers including their full name, phone number, email address, service location address, and a description of the service they need done.  In addition, service professionals register with Red Beacon Inc. in order to receive service requests.  When service professionals register, we require them to provide their full name, business name, phone number, fax number, email address, work radius, hours of availability, photographs of their work or business logo, and a qualitative description of their business.
